title.narrative: AFR RI-Southern Africa Tuberculosis and Health Systems Support Project

description.narrative: The overall objectives of the project are to: (i) improve coverage and quality of TB control and occupational lung disease services in targeted geographic areas of the participating countries; and (ii) strengthen regional capacity to manage the burden of TB and occupational lung diseases; (iii) strengthen country-level and cross-border preparedness and response to disease outbreaks

participating-org.narrative: East, Central and Southern African Health Community (ECSA-HC)

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :AUDA-NEPAD: Annual Work Program | Description :AUDA-NEPAD to furnish to the Association and ECSA-HC a program ofactivities for its respective part of the Project, no later than November 15 in each calendar year | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :Adoption of Cooperation Protocol with other Participating Countries | Description :Adoption of CooperationProtocol with other Participating Countries, in form and substance satisfactory to the Association, no later than twelve (12)months after the First Effective Date, or such later date as the Association may agree | Due Date :30-Sep-2017

Finance Agreement :Adoption of an updated Project Implementation Manual (PIM) | Description :Project Implementing Entities (ECSA-HCand AUDA-NEPAD) to adopt the PIM, in form and substance satisfactory to the Association, no later than one (1) month after FirstEffective Date or such later date as the Association may agree | Due Date :31-Oct-2016

Finance Agreement :Annual Work Program | Description :Recipient shall prepare and furnish to the Association a program ofactivities for inclusion in the Project during the following calender year, "Annual Work Program", not later than November 15 ineach calender year | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :Cooperation Agreement between ECSA-HC and AUDA-NEPAD | Description :Project Implementing Entities (ECSA-HC andAUDA-NEPAD) to enter into Cooperation Agreement in form and substance satisfactory to the Association, no later than three (3)months after the First Effective Date or such later date as the Association may agree | Due Date :March 1, 2017

Finance Agreement :ECSA-HC: Regional Level Consolidated Annual | Description :ECSA-HC to prepare and furnish to the Association aconsolidated program of activities at the regional level, "Consolidated Regional Annual Work Program", not later than December 15ineach calendar year | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :ECSA-HC: Hiring of Finance Officer | Description :ECSA-HC to hire a finance officer for the Project, withqualifications and under terms of reference satisfactory to the Association, no later than three (3) months after the FirstEffective Date, or such later date as the Association may agree | Due Date :31-Dec-2016

Finance Agreement :Establishment of Regional Secretariat | Description :Project Implementing Entity shall establish, no later thantwo (months) after the First Effective Date or such later date as the Association may agree, and thereafter maintain throughoutProject implementation, its team for the Regional Secretariat, in a form and with functions, composition, mandate and staffing andadequate resources as set out in the Project Implementation Manual (PIM) satisfactory to the Association | Due Date :30-Nov-2016

Finance Agreement :Establishment of complaint handling mechanism | Description :Recipient shall establish complaint handlingmechanism to enhance service delivery, satisfactory to the Association, no later than six (6) months after the Effective Date, orsuch later date as the Association may agree | Due Date :31-Mar-2017

Finance Agreement :Hiring of External Auditor | Description :Project Implementing Entities (ECSA-HC and AUDA-NEPAD) to hire anexternal auditor satisfactory to the Association, no later than six (6) months after First Effective Date or such later date as theAssociation may agree | Due Date : September 30, 2017

Finance Agreement :Kingdom of Lesotho: Hiring of Internal Auditor | Description :Recipient to hire an internal auditor for theProject, with qualifications and under terms of reference satisfactory to the Association, no later than three (3) months after theEffective Date or such later date as the Association may agree | Due Date :31 March, 2017

Finance Agreement :Kingdom of Lesotho: Hiring of Procurement Officer | Description :Recipient to hire a procurement officer to theProject Implementing Unit (PIU), with qualifications and under terms of reference satisfactory to the Association, no later thanone (1) month after the Effective Date or such later date as the Association may agree | Due Date :31-Oct-2016

Finance Agreement :Project Completion Report | Description :Project Implementing Entities (ECSA-HC and AUDA-NEPAD) to provide toRecipients not later than three (3) months after the Closing Date, for incorporation in the report referred to in Section 4.08 c ofthe General Conditions, all necessary information for purposes of report preparation | Due Date :31-Mar-2022

Finance Agreement :Republic of Malawi: Computerized accounting software and training | Description :Recipient to have in place acomputerized accounting software and initial training conducted to Project Implementing Unit (PIU) staff no later than three (3)months after Effective Date or such later date as the Association may agree | Due Date : March 1, 2017

Finance Agreement :Republic of Malawi: Hiring of Assistant Accountant | Description :Recipient to hire an assistant account to theProject Implementing Unit (PIU), with qualifications and under terms of reference satisfactory to the Association, no later thanthree (3) months after the Effective Date or such later date as the Association may agree | Due Date :31-Dec-2016

Finance Agreement :Republic of Mozambique: Hiring of Procurement Officer | Description :Recipient to hire a procurement officer tothe Project Implementing Unit (PIU) with qualifications and under terms of reference acceptable to the Association, no later than90days after the Effective Date or such later date as the Association may agree | Due Date :31-Dec-2016

Finance Agreement :Republic of Mozambique: Memorandum of Understanding | Description :Recipient to enter into a Memorandum ofUnderstanding (MOU) with ECSA-HC in form and substance satisfactory to the Association, no later than one (1) month after theEffective Date | Due Date :31-Oct-2016

Finance Agreement :Republic of Zambia: Accounting software | Description :Recipient to ensure that an accounting software is fullyfunctional, acceptable to the Association, no later than six (6) months after the Effective Date or such later date as theAssociation may agree | Due Date :31-Mar-2017

Finance Agreement :Republic of Zambia: Hiring of Internal Auditor | Description :Recipient to hire or assign an internal auditorfor the Project, with qualifications and under terms of reference satisfactory to the Association, no later than three (3) monthsafter Effective Date or such later date as the Association may agree | Due Date : June 15, 2017
